title: Meditation for Balance - Meditation Instructions
cleaned_text: Right hand grasps LEFT thumb while closing LEFT fingers around Right hand. Rest this murda in your lap. Eyes are 9/10th open (allowing a little light in to stimulate the pineal gland). Right hand grasps LEFT thumb while closing LEFT fingers around Right hand. Rest this murda in your lap. (tools to bring the mind into focus and connect the subconscious and conscious mind which brings change). EK ONG KAAR - WAHE GURU (One creative energy, indescribable wisdom) SAT KARTAR - WAHE GURU (Truth is is a Chautay Padma Nirgun mantra, the two parts in each sentence is to create balance) Inhale deeply and hold the breath as you squeeze the spine from base to head. Exhale and release from the top of your head. (repeat 2 more times). 3, 7, 11, 22 min. daily practice for full effect.
